name: I Love Finding MORE Pups
description:
Find and meet a brand new set of adorable pups as you solve puzzles, play mini-games, and explore gorgeous locales from all across the globe in I Love Finding MORE Pups, a classic Hidden Object game with a tail-wagging twist!



More pups to find in a new set of beautifully-drawn locations, complete with animated backgrounds!



Over 20 new minigames to play and enjoy!



Meet and adopt all 20 new pups!
